name: Annual report
text:
The department of business, economic development, and tourism shall make an annual report to the governor and the legislature, including recommendations to further the purposes of this chapter. [L 1964, c 58, pt of §2; Supp, §140A-7; HRS ; am L 1987, c 336, §7; am L 1990, c 293, §8]  Cross References

  Due date of reports, see §93-12.
